metadata.title: Wednesday, 8th July, 2015
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    whether examinations in computer and business studies will be administered in rural schools in 2015 considering that learning and teaching aids in these subjects have not been delivered yet;
(b)    whether the Government will exempt the affected schools from sitting for the examinations in these subjects;
(c)    why the subjects were introduced without the prerequisites at (a); and
(d)    what the way forward on the two subjects is.

questions.question_text: Housing when street lights will be installed in Kafue Estates in Kafue District.
